name: AirWolf PC
description:
On Amstrad it was impossible to pass my level 1. The game being buggy, it was impossible to finish it.

In a short time it will finally be possible to finish level 1.

I am in development with UNITY to redo this cult game.

the sprite sheet is from https://www.spriters-resource.com/amstrad_cpc/airwolf/sheet/101880/

For the moment there is no sound or music, for playing game :  Arrows and SPACE to fire.

For any questions or remarks: https://www.facebook.com/steph.darksteph.1 or https://www.facebook.com/groups/444691573578502
